description: These fritters make a delicious brunch, lunch or light dinner served with salad.
name: Broccoli, Zucchini & Pea Fritters with Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 head broccoli, finely chopped, stalk grated

recipeInstructions.text: Add the grated zucchini to a colander in the sink and squeeze with your hands to remove excess moisture. Pat dry with paper towels and add to a large bowl.
Add the peas, broccoli, spring onions, 2 cloves of garlic and the herbs to the bowl and mix well. Tip in the flour and beaten eggs and mix well to form a batter. Crumble in the feta and mix through.

Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan on a medium high heat and drop tablespoons of batter in, working in batches. Push down with the back of a spoon to form a patties and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden, remove and repeat with the next batch.
In a small bowl, whisk together the yoghurt, lemon juice and zest and remaining garlic. Serve dolloped on top of the fritters.
